meanings.sent1: The bracelet had small annuluses that made it look elegant.
meanings.sent2: The planet Saturn is known for its beautiful annuluses.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a long string of colorful annuluses out of his hat.
meanings.sent4: The tree trunk had annuluses of different colors, like a natural rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The Olympic symbol consists of five interconnected annuluses.

meanings.definition: The opening at the end of the digestive tract through which waste is eliminated
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained the importance of keeping the annuluses clean for good health.
meanings.sent2: After the meal, the food travels through the annuluses to be expelled from the body.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character slipped on a banana peel and landed on his annuluses.
meanings.sent4: The drain was clogged, causing water to back up in the annuluses.
meanings.sent5: The plumber used a special tool to unclog the annuluses in the pipe.
